name: Ecopoise
overview:
Community: The company will focus on improving the list of recyclable items received from the Residential areas of Baltimore. Our post-consumer goods list is limited only by the inquiries we receive. Participating in programs geared toward the education of the youth toward greener solutions for the future.

Government: will work with local municipalities to improve the results of recycling efforts at local landfills and transfer stations, by increasing diversion with a second wave of separation

Buisness (Small/Midsize): will pay close attention to the businesses that are not big enough to participate in the larger scale programs for the lack of volume.

Recyclers: will work with local recyclers to make the distribution channels available for the increase amounts of recyclable items and assisting with the harder to recycle items they are presented with. With each month of operations we have become know more and more by this industry as the fixers. If you have commodity that cannot be moved on phone call to us and we can arrange for an interested party within 48 hours.
